title.rendered: Transez at China Business Forum this September

content.rendered:
Transez Nigeria Limited will be represented at the forthcoming 11th edition of the annual Nigeria – China Business and Investment Forum (NCBIF) in three Chinese cities of Ningxia, Shaanxi and Shanxi from 11 – 24 September, 2013. The Investment forum is being organized by the Nigerian Investment Promotion Commission with the theme “Nigeria – China Economic Relations; building on the momentum”

The forum will focus on the following sectors that are part of the priority areas of the present Administration of President Goodluck Ebele Jonathan, GCFR

* Construction
* Banking and Finance
* Agriculture/ Agric Business
* Tourism
* Solid Minerals
* lCT
* Transport/Aviation
* Leather & foot wears
* Oil & Gas
